com.soen.risk.entity

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.soen.risk.entity.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.util.Observable
    This class is responsible to hold the name, army capacity remaining and list of countries owned by the player instance. It is being observed by the domination view to calculate the share of each player.
    Since:
    2018-10-31
    Version:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Amit Sachdeva, Varun Singhal

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(int nameSuffix)
      Initialise the player with given suffix and empty list of owned countries.
